title: Luxurious studio near Lechmere Station and NorthPoint for Sep/2022
posting_body: I have a Luxurious Studio available for sublet starting on Sep/2022 at a Luxurious building (see the <URL>).
Starting day is negotiable in the week from Aug/28-Sep/03.
After that, you can renew it directly with the building management.
The apartment has dishwasher, laundry, drier in unit, and all basic utilities.
The neighborhood is very friendly and I love living here.
The building has a 24h high-class gym, swimming pool, rooftop, lounge area, doorman, garage, bicycle storage, theater room.
The area is 3' away from the northpoint park.
The lease started at off-season price and it is ~$400 cheaper than today's price.
There is a $500 fee for lease transfer.
